SELECT "settings".* FROM "settings" WHERE (thing_type is ? and thing_id is ?) AND "settings"."var" = $? ORDER BY "settings"."id" ASC LIMIT $?

SELECT a.attname, format_type(a.atttypid, a.atttypmod),
       pg_get_expr(d.adbin, d.adrelid), a.attnotnull, a.atttypid, a.atttypmod,
       c.collname, col_description(a.attrelid, a.attnum) AS comment,
       a.attidentity AS identity,
       attgenerated as attgenerated
  FROM pg_attribute a
  LEFT JOIN pg_attrdef d ON a.attrelid = d.adrelid AND a.attnum = d.adnum
  LEFT JOIN pg_type t ON a.atttypid = t.oid
  LEFT JOIN pg_collation c ON a.attcollation = c.oid AND a.attcollation <> t.typcollation
 WHERE a.attrelid = ?::regclass
   AND a.attnum > ? AND NOT a.attisdropped
 ORDER BY a.attnum

SELECT a.attname
  FROM (
         SELECT indrelid, indkey, generate_subscripts(indkey, ?) idx
           FROM pg_index
          WHERE indrelid = ?::regclass
            AND indisprimary
       ) i
  JOIN pg_attribute a
    ON a.attrelid = i.indrelid
   AND a.attnum = i.indkey[i.idx]
 ORDER BY i.idx
